sentence: (RTTNews) - Procter & Gamble Co. (PG) announced a profit for its first quarter that increased from last year.
The company's earnings came in at $3.59 billion, or $1.36 per share.
This compares with $3.19 billion, or $1.22 per share, in last year's first quarter.
Excluding items, Procter & Gamble Co. reported adjusted earnings of $3.62 billion or $1.37 per share for the period.
Analysts had expected the company to earn $1.24 per share, according to figures compiled by Thomson Reuters.
Analysts' estimates typically exclude special items.
The company's revenue for the quarter fell 6.2% to $16.69 billion from $17.79 billion last year.
-Analysts Estimate: $1.24 -Revenue (Q1): $16.69 Bln vs. $17.79 Bln last year.
